tool_description: API to obtain official informations about cities, provinces and regions of Italy
name: APIItaly
title: APIItaly

api_list.name: Region
api_list.description: Obtain all italian regions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apiitaly.p.rapidapi.com/region"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apiitaly.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
